venue.address_1: Shoreham, NY-address will be emailed to you upon RSVP
venue.name: Jodi Cahill's House

item.description: You are invited to a Mystery Hostess Scrapbook Party!  Join the fun on Saturday, November 12th, 2011 for the Memory Works Fall 2011 CATALOG KICK-OFF!  Brand new catalog with tons of new product lines!  Just for coming you are entered into a raffle to be the Mystery Hostess for the night where you would get all the Hostess Rewards including the monthly Hostess incentive, free shipping and free products!  This meetup event is free!  RSVP today!
item.name: Mystery Hostess Scrapbook Party!
